PATIENT_ID: TEST_GERIATRIC_HIP_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-14 07:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-14 07:10:00
Category II activation for 82-year-old female. Mechanical fall at home.
Age 82. Right hip pain and inability to bear weight.
BP 138/82, HR 76, RR 16, GCS 15.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-14 07:30:00
AP pelvis x-ray: right intertrochanteric fracture confirmed.
Hip fracture identified on imaging. Proximal femur fracture.
Imaging confirms hip fracture.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-14 08:00:00
Orthopedic consultation obtained.
Orthopedic assessment documents intertrochanteric hip fracture, stable pattern.
Fracture classification: AO/OTA 31-A2.
Surgical intervention planned. ORIF recommended.
Surgery within 24 hours. Operative fixation scheduled for tomorrow morning.
Surgical timing documented.
Medical clearance in progress.
